Serialized Form

  • Package ru.nordavind.ecgdonglelib

    • Class ru.nordavind.ecgdonglelib.ECGDongleDevice extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • type

          ECGDongleType type
          device type

        • deviceId

          java.lang.String deviceId
          string that identifies this device

        • deviceUUID

          java.lang.String deviceUUID
          connected device UUID string, should match DongleIdentity.uuid it's OK only on Android > 5.0 (21) it is zero-filled on Android < 5.0, for Demo devices and for BLE devices Can be null for older ECG Dongle Service versions

    • Class ru.nordavind.ecgdonglelib.filter.FilterSettings extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • doFilter

          boolean doFilter
          true if filters should be enabled

        • rejFilterQ

          int rejFilterQ
          Rejection filter quality min = 24, max = 100

        • upperFrequency

          FilterSettings.UpperFrequency upperFrequency
          Upper frequency for low-pass filter

        • rejectionFilterFrequency

          PowerFrequency rejectionFilterFrequency
          Frequency for a Rejection filter Rejection filter is used to filter power lines induction noise; 50 Hz ot 60 Hz

        • KEY_FILTER_ENABLED

          java.lang.String KEY_FILTER_ENABLED

        • KEY_REJECT_FILTER_QUALITY

          java.lang.String KEY_REJECT_FILTER_QUALITY

        • KEY_UPPER_FERQUENCY

          java.lang.String KEY_UPPER_FERQUENCY

        • KEY_REJECTION_FILTER_FREQUENCY

          java.lang.String KEY_REJECTION_FILTER_FREQUENCY

      • Serialized Fields

        • appVersion

          java.lang.String appVersion
          app version (service dongle)

        • channelConfiguration

          DongleLeadConfiguration channelConfiguration
          channel configuration of current ECG Dongle device. IDs for hardware and software leads.

        • socketName

          java.lang.String socketName
          socket name to connect to

        • ecgDongleIdentity

          DongleIdentity ecgDongleIdentity
          ECG Dongle identity device id, firmware version, channel count etc.

        • descriptors

          ChannelDescriptorLib[] descriptors
          channel descriptors for hardware leads; each ChannelDescriptor holds all info about channel samples: frequency, period, chunk size, coefficients required to calculate values from samples

        • filter

          ScanFilterInfo filter
          hardware/software filters info

        • calibrationSettings

          SimpleCalibrationSettings calibrationSettings
          device calibration settings
